https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

I moved this to a new CL to avoid the confusing history of the old CL
number. All the numbers in the CL description are up-to-date.

Russ

LGTM
cool how the parsing code hardly changes

This change caused a regression for us.

http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=3701
